title: Robust Battery Interphases from Dilute Fluorinated Cations

Chulgi Nathan Hong, Mengwen Yan, Oleg A. Borodin, Travis P. Pollard, Langyuan Wu, Manuel Reiter, Dario Gomez Vazquez, Katharina Trapp, Jimun Yoo, Netanel Shpigel, Jeremy I. Feldblyum, Maria R. Lukatskaya
Controlling solid electrolyte interphase (SEI) in batteries is crucial for their efficient cycling. Herein, we demonstrate an approach to enable robust battery performance that does not rely on high fractions...
